variables.name: clickOutside
variables.raw:
/**
 * Calls a function when the user clicks outside the element.
 *
 * @example
 * ```svelte
 * <div on:outclick={someFunction} use:clickOutside={{ whitelist: ['.burger'] }}>
 * ```
 *
 */
variables.summary: Calls a function when the user clicks outside the element.

types.name: ClickOutsideEvent
types.summary: Calls `outclick` when a parent element is clicked.
